languages.text: {n}Паскаль не произносит ни слова, но вам кажется, что под маской-респиратором на его лице возникают брезгливо-осуждающие морщины.{/n}
{n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль не произносит ни слова, но вам кажется, что под маской-респиратором на его лице возникают брезгливо-осуждающие морщины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqual does not say a word, but you think you see the disgusted and disapproving wrinkles under his respirator.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは一言も発しないが、あなたは、彼の人工呼吸器の下に嫌悪感と不満の表情にシワを寄せているのが見えるような気がする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは一言も発しないが、あなたは、彼の人工呼吸器の下に嫌悪感と不満の表情にシワを寄せているのが見えるような気がする。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡什么都没说，但你似乎感觉到他厌恶地皱着眉，呼吸器下面似乎传来了不满的哼声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡什么都没说，但你似乎感觉到，他的呼吸器下面似乎传来了厌恶与不满的哼声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal no dice ni una palabra, pero te parece ver arrugas de disgusto y desaprobación bajo su respirador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal no dice ni una palabra, pero te parece ver las arrugas de disgusto y desaprobación bajo su respirador.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sagt kein Wort, aber du glaubst zu erkennen, wie er unter seinem Respirator angewidert das Gesicht verzieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sagt kein Wort, doch du glaubst zu sehen, dass er unter seinem Respirator angewidert und missbilligend die Lippen kräuselt.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ne dit pas un mot, mais il vous semble percevoir des rides de dégoût et de désapprobation sous son respirateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ne dit pas un mot, mais il vous semble percevoir des rides de dégoût et de désapprobation sous son respirateur.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, hiçbir şey söylemese de solunum maskesinin altındaki yüzünün tiksinti ve kınamayla buruştuğunu görür gibi oluyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal does not say a word, but you think you see his face wrinkling in disgust and disapproval under his respirator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hiçbir şey söylemiyor ancak solunum maskesinin altındaki yüzünün tiksinti ve kınamayla buruştuğunu görür gibi oluyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
